# Documentation Standards

For comprehensive documentation standards, see [.agents/steering/documentation.md](../../.agents/steering/documentation.md).

## Quick Reference

- Use proper heading hierarchy (# → ## → ###)
- Include YAML front matter for structured documents
- Use code blocks with language specifiers
- Use relative links for cross-references
- Avoid broken links and absolute paths

*This file serves as a Copilot-specific entry point. The authoritative steering content is maintained in `.agents/steering/documentation.md`.*
